skillDetailsWithMonstersList.skillDescription: Aura: All Goblins in the party receive 10% less damage and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.
Aura: All Goblins in the party deal 10% more damage and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.
Aura: Heal all Goblins in the party by 10% of their own Max Health at the start of every turn and apply a random buff.
Aura: All Goblins in the party have 15% increased Mana Regeneration and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.
Aura: Every Goblin gains 2 Charge stacks at the end of their turn for every Goblin in the party.
Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Goblins.
Grants target Goblin or Occult Monster 4 random Buffs and a shield equal to 40% of their Max Health.
